question: Which country hosts the permanent secretariat of the Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB)?
explanation: The Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) is the largest association of Election Management Bodies (EMBs) worldwide. A-WEB was established on October 14, 2013, in Song-do, South Korea. The permanent secretariat of A-WEB is located in Seoul, South Korea. A-WEBâ€™s vision is to foster efficiency and effectiveness in conducting free, fair, transparent and participative elections worldwide.
